Room.Name: Rosecrest Street
Room.ShortDescription: You are traveling along Oceancrest Street, east of the Recycling Center.
Room.LongDescription: The Oceancrest Recycling Plant and Reclaimation Center processes every piece of garbage that everyone has ever thrown out onto the street in order to make more useful products. The citizens are encouraged to bring trash to the recycling centers throughout town and offer five gold pieces for each piece of trash recycled. On the east side of the road, you can see the Ivanhouse Sporting Facility, the entrance to which is located to the south off of Netherworld Lane.
